level.text: Clients eligible to receive TCM services shall be Medicaid recipients who meet the following qualifications:
Are twenty (20) years of age or less; and
Are either at risk of abuse or neglect, or are abused or neglected, and are in the care or custody of CFSA.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Emergency Rulemaking published at 47 DCR 5257 (June 23, 2000) [EXPIRED]; as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 47 DCR 7084 (September 1, 2000).
